scripts.test:1-node: start npm run evm:node3 && timeout 5 && start npm run blockchain:node3
scripts.test:3-evm: start npm run evm:node1 && start npm run evm:node2 && start npm run evm:node3
scripts.test:3-blockchain: timeout 5 && start npm run blockchain:node1 && start npm run blockchain:node2 && start npm run blockchain:node3
scripts.test:3-nodes: npm run test:3-evm && npm run test:3-blockchain
scripts.dev: start npm run evm && timeout 5 && start npm run blockchain
scripts.stop: (for /f "tokens=5" %A in ('netstat -nao -p TCP ^| findstr 3001') do @wmic process where processid=%A get processid,parentprocessid | findstr %A >tempfile) & (for /f "tokens=1" %A in (tempfile) do echo about to kill process %A & taskkill /F /PID %A ) && (del tempfile)
